mapper.select: select a.*, b.name as model_name, c.name as type_name, d.name as vender_name, e.name as staff_name, f.name as return_name from ( select i.*, r.id as record_id, r.staff_id, r.borrow_time, r.return_time, r.describe, r.return_id, r.remark from t_omm_instrument i, t_omm_instrument_record r where i.id = r.instrument_id ) a LEFT JOIN t_omm_equipment_model b ON a.model_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_omm_equipment_type c ON a.type_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_omm_equipment_vender d ON a.vender_id = d.id left join t_common_staff e on a.staff_id = e.id left join t_common_staff f on a.return_id = f.id where a.record_id = #{id}
